name: SPACE BLAST (Roligt Studios)
description:
In Space Blast, you play as Zam, an alien who is the king of Mars. One day, massive riots take place on his planet with no explanation. Zam has to travel through the solar system and dive down the rabbit hole to discover the inner workings of a large conspiracy. With unique, colorful environments and new options for traversal in each world, Space Blast has something to offer to fans of classic overhead shooters like Pocky and Rocky or Fester's Quest.

Xinput REQUIRED to play. Created by Jackson Dalton with logo design from Jesterr, voiceover from BasedShaman, and music from GEMANIZM and Allan Stuart Heltzel.
